metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8953 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: OpenVPN Access Server 2.8.x before 2.8.1 allows LDAP authentication bypass (except when a user is enrolled in two-factor authentication).

notes.Note: msalvatore> only affects OpenVPN Access Server v2.8.0 mdeslaur> OpenVPN Access server is the commercial application.

criterions.comment: openvpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
